name: Cryptocurrency trading application
description: This is a global cryptocurrency trading platform. Users can register, perform KYC and buy or sell or convert into multiple cryptocurrencies.
highlights: Working as a front-end React JS programmer
Implemented a complex refresh token logic inside a HTTP middileware. Made it work for even simultaneous HTTP requests
Implemented the aadhaar card third party integration that made the KYC step quicker
Planned project execution and timelines as per dependencies
Handled client communicationa nd integrated with client APIs

name: Telehealth application
description: US based medical application. It shows heart / lung recordings of a patients along with few questions asked to the patient. The admins can manage all patients, doctors and their appointments here
highlights: Working as a front-end Angular 8 programmer
Appreciated by client over work, ownership and clear communication
Reduced 100% of validation and form errors by creating reusable components in the framework and setup standards together with team-members
Converted existing audio processing code in C to JS to filter and hear sound in the web application
Integrated Twilio video call feature in the angular application

name: Oil shipping activity tracking application
description: US based shipping activity tracking application. The software manages vessel's inventory, health and travel. All the metrics are recorded and updated in real time
highlights: Created the base application framework and setup standards together with team-members
Appreciated for my efforts in creating a common table component with multiple plug and play features.
Extensively used common / reusable components and reactive forms.
Reduced 100% of validation and form errors by creating reusable components in the framework and setup standards together with team-members
Converted existing audio processing code in C to JS to filter and hear sound in the web application
Integrated Twilio video call feature in the angular application

name: Background verification application
description: A background verification application. Organisations can enroll and add their agents / HRs. These agents can then updload the candidates whose background verification needs to be done. Each of the candidates will get a link and they can continues the process. A report for each of the cadidate will be available for the agent to check.
highlights: Started as a back-end programmer working in NodeJS & MySql. Soon played a full stack developer role handling front-end(Angular 2), back-end and production deployment
Integrated ReportJS third party reducing the server communications work by 50% during report generations
Optimized performance by implementing query optimisation, async processing, transaction pooling, vulnerability testing (SQL injection, HSTS, etc...), Load balancers, Child processes, etc...

Setup and maintained development environment in AWS cloud with services like SNS, SES, Lambda, Cloudfront, EC2, RDS, S3 and firebase. Have provided support several times. With issue fix under 1-4hrs. Have received appreciation from the client on the same
Maintained all client communications and change request processing

name: Finance management application
description: An account management application that will sort the customer's billing book details and show financials
highlights: Worked as a front-end developer (Angular 7) upgraded the legacy application into the latest angular version
Have implemented complex functionalities like drag and drop, tree wise recursive data structuring and processing. Have received appreciation from the client on the same
Effectively used polyfills to support the these complex functionalities available in legacy browser IE

name: Housing finanace application
description: Wordpress application of a leading finance company in India. The application hosts few custom interest calculators and housing plans.
highlights: Created the multiple custom plugins in the wordpress to implement custom housing loan interest calculation
Created custom plugin to list, record and maintain the vaious form submissions in the wordpress application
Migrated the wordpress application accross multiple server environments
